page.title: 06DUNDEE - SPECIAL AIR SERVICE
page.content: The ability to survive in open, rough country on what is available is also developed. A further 2 week selection course follows where endurance is stretched to the limit. The motto of the S.A.S. is{" WHO {DARES WINS." }The 23rd squadron have a second motto {" WASH YOUR WEAPON {BEFORE YOURSELF."} The 23rd squadron is not an airborne unit but every man is a parachutist. To get behind enemy lines the S.A.S. use boats, submarines, helicopters, canoes and skis but they believe the best and quietest is "legs". Some of the 23rd squadron helped to relieve the Iranian Embassy Siege when, in 1980 terrorists held 26 hostages at gunpoint for 6 days. The S.A.S. burst in and freed the hostages in 17 minutes.
